channel.title: Nomad drops help! restarting server everytime he die! plz help!
channel.description:
im using this like drops
[code]#Nomad 8528:20 14641:1 14642:1 14484:1 19780:1 995:10000000 4151:1 15441:1 15442:1 15443:1 15444:1 15332:2[/code]
when im using the shift tab and make it correctly , ( the drop coming all time but it restart the run-server. ) so sometime when u got luck the item stay on floor but 95% of time its disapear someone could tell me what i have to , i mean how to add it? plz someone have 2 minute to come on teamviewer just for help a poor guy who trying to make his players happy :S
